item.title: Elon Musk Flexes His Political Strength as Government Shutdown Looms
item.description: The world’s richest man led the charge to kill a bipartisan spending deal, in part by promoting false and misleading claims about it.

item.title: Putin Glosses Over Russian Setbacks, Including Syria
item.description: The Russian president, in a marathon annual news conference, said that he had not yet met with Bashar al-Assad, the ousted Syrian leader who fled to M...

item.title: Trump Tossed a Debt Limit Grenade Into Spending Talks. Here’s Why.
item.description: President-elect Donald J. Trump was forced to negotiate with Democrats over the borrowing cap during his first term.

item.title: Why It’s a Mistake to Charge Luigi Mangione With Terrorism
item.description: It could complicate a simple case and turn it into a political circus.

item.title: Why Kylie Kelce’s Podcast, ‘Not Gonna Lie,’ Is a Breakout Hit
item.description: But in her first interview since her podcast reached No. 1, she does share ideas about why the show has become a breakout hit.
